    • Method Detail

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove(int fromX,
                       int fromY,
                       int toX,
                       int toY,
                       Configuration configuration)
        Check if the piece can make passed move in an ideal empty and infinite chessBoard. The configuration will be checked only if the piece have some special move that is triggered only depending other pieces on the board (like pawns)
        Specified by:
        canMove in class ChessPiece

        public boolean canFly()
        Returns true if the piece can pass through the other pieces, this piece can't
        Specified by:
        canFly in class ChessPiece
